description: This file defines the NativeZilkerClient class, which implements the ZilkerClient interface. It manages the lifecycle of a Zilker client process, including configuration setup, process start/stop, IPC communication, and utility functions for process introspection. It is also responsible for resource management, environment setup, and process monitoring within the project.

classes.name: NativeZilkerClient
classes.description: Class responsible for managing the lifecycle and configuration of the Zilker client process, including starting, stopping, and resource setup.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates the startup process for the Zilker client, including configuration setup and process launch.

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Gracefully shuts down the Zilker client process, attempting IPC shutdown sequences or forcibly killing the process if needed.

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Restarts the Zilker client process by stopping and then starting it again.

methods.name: doBacktrace
methods.description: Attempts to generate a backtrace of the running process using GDB for debugging purposes.
